characterList: 贊舍啥洽旺碧汪枉珠噩鱷鬥栓柱鉤鈔銷鎖

characters.story: The shellfish stands for succor, shouting "Dzahn!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
When the tongue meets the roof, they form abode, shouting "Shuh!" sharply!
The mouth stands for wha?, asking "Shah? What?" curiously spoken through parted lips!
"Chyah!" Water fit commanded sharply - in agreement, harmonious accord!
The sun takes the shape of thriving, shouting "Wahng!" sharply!
The stone stands for green jade, shouting "Bee!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
See how the water forms tearful? It sings "Wahng!" cheerfully!
The tree takes the shape of crooked, whispering "Wahng" softly!
Picture pearl taking form - it sings "Joo!" with vivid energy!
A striking symbol for shocking that shouts "Uh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Picture crocodile taking form - it shouts "Uh!" with vivid energy!
This character represents fight, shouting "Doh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The tree takes the shape of plug, singing "Shwahn!" cheerfully!
The tree stands for pillar, shouting "Joo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
When the hook meets the metal, they form hook, singing "Goh!" cheerfully!
"Chao!" Few pieces of metal sang cheerfully - paper money, banknotes, currency!
The metal stands for put up for sale, singing "Shyao!" cheerfully!
The metal stands for lock, whispering "Swoh" softly - a vivid image to remember!
